channel.title: Help With Creating XAMPP Databases Please!
channel.description: Ok I began looking through the new 601/602 Server and Client that were realesed, and it tells me to install databases for "Players", "Packets", And "Items" in the XAMPP LocalHost, Which I did. But now I don't know what to do with those databases or how to set them up to help with the Server/Client. Someone please help? I can't log on it until i figure this out so I would appreciate it if someone responded ASAP. Thank You!

item.title: Help With Creating XAMPP Databases Please!
item.dc:creator: @Sigtinius Sigtinius
item.description:
@Sigtinius wrote:

I’ll try that.

Thanks Man!

Read full topic
item.source: Help With Creating XAMPP Databases Please!

item.title: Help With Creating XAMPP Databases Please!
item.dc:creator: @Sigtinius Sigtinius
item.description:
@Sigtinius wrote:

Yea I set everything up perfectly, there was even an account created in the example database, and the server says its online and everything, but it tries to log in for like a minute and then says error and tells me to try a different world. Is there a way to create the databases for items/players/packets without using XAMPP? Im just not that familiar with it and it’s confusing me. If there is any way to build those into the 602 server/client that you could help me with, i’d appreciate it. Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Help With Creating XAMPP Databases Please!
